text.1: Based on the edition by Sudarshana Devi Singhal:
text.100: śakaṭaṃ viṣṇur ityuktaṃ vṛṣabho vā pitāmahaḥ /
text.102: saṅ hyaṅ viṣṇu pinakaratha / saṅ hyaṅ brahmā pinakavṛṣabha / saṅ hyaṅ īśvara sira pinakasārathi / bhaṭāra śiva sira umuṅguh ri tṅah niṅ ratha / sira pinakajīva nika kabeh //
text.107: i tṅah nikaṅ tribhuvanamaṇḍala / hana ta brahmābhuvana / mvaṅ viṣṇubhuvana / lavan rudrabhuvana / pratyakṣa cūtabimba / kadi pva lvirnya / i tṅah nikaṅ cūtabimba / hana ta trikoṇa maṅkana / kahananira bhaṭara śiva / lavan ikaṅ padma numuṅguh ri pāntara niṅ susu mvaṅ ṅalih / sinaṅguh brahmābhuvana / mvaṅ viṣṇubhuvana ya tata humāpitiṅ kaṅ rudrabhuvana / sira tāṅĕnaṅĕnta / yan ahyun lpasa / hayva kolik vih / apan sira sinaṅguh paraṅ brahmadeśa / hana amuhara prihati //
text.11: THIS GRETIL TEXT FILE IS FOR REFERENCE PURPOSES ONLY!
text.112: hana ta vinta ṅaranya / ampuh sāṅguṣṭha göṅnya / umuṅgu pradeśa niṅ hati / prasiddha ya sinaṅguh kāṣṭaiśvaryyan ṅaranya / i tṅah niṅ ampruh / ṅkāna ta uṅgvan bhaṭareśvara / sira ta pūjākĕnta / i kālānta mūjāhanta ṣaḍvarṇṇa / oṃ sa ba ta a i / nahan ta liṅanta / athavā / oṃ namah śivāya / nahan taṅ ṣaḍakṣara ṅaranya / lvir niṅ ṣaḍvarṇṇa ika / sira ta pamūjānta / huvus pva nikāmūjā / umaṅĕnaṅĕn bhaṭara śiva / an vvyāpakeṅ rāt / alilaṅ tar kneṅ gḷṅ //
text.113: tripadaṃ puṇḍarīkasya hṛdi mūle kaṇṭhe matam /
text.114: sarvā nāḍīḥ samāhṛtya raśma yo hi harer iva // 19
text.115: hana ta padma umuṅguh ri hati / lavan riṅ pusĕr / mvaṅ riṅ gulu / tiga kvehnya / atyanta ri sūkṣma ya / i ruhur vitnya / sumuṅsaṅ i sor skarnya //sarvvā nāḍīh samāhṛtya / ikaṅ padma ya ta ṅ āśraya nikaṅ nāḍī kabeh / vitnya liṅanya tejanya kadi teja niṅ āditya //
text.116: kamalaṃ yaddhṛdi mūle tiktaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ bhṛśaṃ bhavet /
text.118: hana ta kamala ṅaranya / pusuhpusuh / ya ta muṅguh ri vit niṅ hati / hana ta kṛṣṇa ṅaranya / ya sinaṅguh tikta / hana ta atikṛṣṇa ṅaranya / ika ta kabeh / paramaloka ṅaranya / kahanan bhaṭara śiva / sira ta kabhaktyan de saṅ yogīśvara //
text.119: svaliṅgaṃ paraliṅgaṃ vā svayam eva karoti yaḥ /
text.12: COPYRIGHT AND TERMS OF USAGE AS FOR SOURCE FILE.
text.121: hana ta svaliṅga ṅaranya / mvaṅ paraliṅga / saṅkṣepanya / rva ikaṅ liṅga / ika dumeh pvaṅ vruha gumave bāhyaliṅga / ikaṅ paraliṅga / yeka svaliṅga ṅaranya kaliṅan iṅ sarvvabhūta / vuvusĕnta tekaṅ svaliṅga anaku saṅ kumāra //
text.122: ātmani svayam utpannaṃ svaliṅgam iti codyate /
text.123: svaliṅgaṃ pūrvvam utpannaṃ paraliṅgaṃ procyate budhaiḥ // 22
text.124: ika dumeh kita vruha ri ātmanta vih / anuṅ sama sarvvajñā ya sinaṅguh ātmaliṅga ṅaranya / ri denya ikeṅ ātmaliṅga / ya tika vyakta kinavruhan rumuhun / kamnaṅ kita vruha riṅ bāhyaliṅga / si manayakĕn ikaṅ svaliṅga / ya ta kavruhana kamuṅ kumāra //
text.127: ikaṅ bāhyaliṅga / lvirnya parhyaṅan / prāsāda yadyan sevu kvehnya / ika ta kabeh paḍa ya kalavan ātmaliṅga / taham pih / tan paḍa ika / aṅhiṅ ātmaliṅga juga ḷvih saṅka riṅ liṅga kabeh //
text.130: sevu ta kveha nikaṅ ratnaliṅga / paḍaha ta kadivyan lavan śivaliṅga tuṅgal / akṣiliṅga sevu / paḍaha ta kadivyan lavan ātmaliṅga tuṅgal / nihan vaneh //
text.131: tryakṣaraṃ ca padaṃ yuktam oṅkāraḥ samudāhṛtaḥ /
text.133: sira saṅ hyaṅ tryakṣara / mvaṅ pada tlu / hana brahmāpada / mvaṅ viṣṇupada / mvaṅ rudrapada / sira sinaṅguh oṃkāra ṅaranira / hana ta manah mapagĕh / makāśraya bhaṭara śiva / liṅgarūpa / ya teka śivaliṅga ṅaranya / tan paḍa ika / nihan vaneh kocapanya de saṅ vruh //
text.134: apsu devo dvijātīnām ṛṣīṇāṃ divi devatā /
text.135: śilākhaṇḍaṃ ca lokānāṃ munīnām ātmaiva devatā // 26
text.136: liṅ saṅ vatĕk brāhmaṇa / riṅ tīrttha kādhikāran bhaṭara / liṅ saṅ vatĕk ṛṣi / riṅ ākāśa kādhikāran bhaṭara / riṅ loka pva ya / riṅ vatu / riṅ kayu / lavan liṅir pratimā kādhikāran bhaṭara / kunaṅ ri saṅ vatĕk yogī / ri saṅ hyaṅ ātmā kādhikāran bhaṭara //
text.139: hana saṅ kālajñāna ṅaranya / vruhnya ri kagivaṅ saṅ puruṣa / yeka saṅ kālajñāna ṅaranya / nimitta niṅ manĕmvakĕn / hana ta ajñāna humādhikārākĕn kasaṅsāran saṅ puruṣa / an pavalivali riṅ janmaloka / māyā kajanmasaṅsāra ṅaranya / nimitta niṅ maṅguhakĕn punarjjanma niṅ hulun / liṅ bhaṭara //
text.14: (This file is to be used with a UTF-8 font and your browser's VIEW configuration
text.141: arccayanti ca ye mūrkkhāḥ phalaṃ kiṃcit prāpnuyus te // 28
text.142: hna vvaṅ magḷm amūjā riṅ bāhyaliṅga / ndātan vruh ya riṅ ātmaliṅga / ika ta vvaṅ maṅkana / yeka mūrkkha pamūjā ṅaranya / maḍala ya dipun kapaṅgihanya / yadyapin akḍikḍik atovi maḍala ta ya //
text.143: sakṛt smaranti māṃ kecit śataṃ smaranti māṃ pare /
text.144: nityaṃ smaranti māmanye paraṃ tatkāryyam eteṣām // 29
text.145: hana ta vvaṅ humaṅĕnaṅĕn aku pisan / hana ta vvaṅ humaṅĕnaṅĕn aku piṅ śata / hana ta vvaṅ humaṅĕnaṅĕn aku satata / nityaśah ya tan kahilaṅanyārttha / manaṅguh pinakatuturnya / uttamakāryyanya ḷvih ya //
text.147: tūryyam eva suṣuptaṃ ca uttaraṃ jāgrad ucyate // 30
text.148: hana ta svapnapada ṅaranya / ya sinaṅguh yugānta / dakṣiṇāyana ṅaranya / hana ta jāgrapada ṅaranya / ya sinaṅguh uttarāyaṇa ṅaranya / hana ta suṣuptapada ṅaranya / ya sinaṅguh tūryyapada ṅaranya //
text.150: padaṃ jāgrad idaṃ vāme suṣuptaṃ sthāna eva ca // 31
text.151: hana ta padma tiga kvehnya / lor kidul ri tṅah sthānanya / svapnapada ikaṅ padma kidul / jāgrapada ikaṅ padma lor / suṣuptapada ikaṅ padma i tṅah //jalāśrayasamāyuktam /namas te 'stu me vandanam // ikaṅ padma ri tṅah ya tumiṇḍihi ruhur / ikaṅ padma kidul mvaṅ ikaṅ padma lor / yeka ṅaran bhūmivarddhana (?) kadi talāgama sat (?) //
text.152: ūrdhvaṃ bisaṃ pramāṇena tripramāṇena vā viduḥ /
text.154: samaṅkana hiriṅanya piṇḍuhurnya tigaṅ aṅguli / samaṅkana hiriṅanya tigaṅ aṅguli ta ya / piṅsornya tigaṅ aṅguli ta ya / nahan ta lvir niṅ padmakośa śarīra //
text.156: śivasya ramate tatremāṃ māyāṃ vidadhe raviḥ // 33
text.157: ika tripada ṅaranya / jāgrapada / suṣuptapada / svapnapada / ya maṇḍala tiga ṅaranya / hana ta trikoṇa ṅkāna / kunaṅ i tṅah nikaṅ trikoṇa / i ṅkāna ta kahanan bhaṭara śiva / tamolah magave māyā / akveh lvirnira //
text.158: padmanālaṃ hṛdi sthitaṃ jāgratsvapnau tathaiva ca /
text.160: ikaṅ padmanāla ya / umuṅgv iṅ hati / jāgrapada ya rovaṅnya muṅgv iṅ hati / hyaṅ niṅ pdmanāla / hyaṅ īśvara / mvaṅ ikaṅ devatā kabeḥ hana ṅkāna //
text.162: yatra devaḥ sthito nityaṃ tadviddhi munipuṅgava // 35
text.163: ikaṅ padma ri tṅah niṅ rva / ya suṣuptapada ṅaranya / ya teka kahanan bhaṭara nityakāla / sira ta kavruhaknanta kamuṅ kumāra //
text.166: lvir niṅ teja nira haneṅ pusĕr / kadi teja niṅ apuy / lvir niṅ teja haneṅ hati / kadi teja niṅ āditya / lvir niṅ teja nira ri laklakan kadi teja niṅ vulan / lvir niṅ teja nira haneṅ iruṅ / kadi teja niṅ maṇik sphaṭika //
text.169: pāntara niṅ alis / kadi prabhā niṅ maṇīndranīla / ikaṅ rahi kadi lvir niṅ miñak / riṅ pāṇi kadi teja niṅ pirak / ri tṅah niṅ hulu / tatan hana teja niran hana ṅkāna / nirvvarṇṇa //
text.171: ? āgninā malaśuddhaṃ ca śūnyastham anantaṃ viduḥ ? // 38
text.172: ḍataṅ pva ya riṅ ākāśamaṇḍala / kapaṅguh taṅ brahmadvāra / vunvunan / ya brahmadvāra / ṅa / ika ta kabeh gsĕṅ deniṅ apuy riṅ pusĕr / uvus pva ya gsĕṅ sahananya / tka ta ya ri pada bhaṭāra / ika pada tanana uttama liṅ bhaṭara //
text.173: jāgratsvapnau ca vijñeyau suṣuptaṃ padam eva ca /
text.174: kaivalyaṃ paraṃ kaivalyaṃ saptākāśam ity ucyate // 39
text.175: hana jāgrapada ṅaranya / hana svapnapada ṅaranya / hana suṣuptapada ṅaranya / hana tūryyapada ṅaranya / hana kaivalyapada ṅaranya / hana paramakaivalyapada ṅaranya / hana tūryyapada ṅaranya / ika ta kabeh ya / sinaṅguh saptākāśa ṅaranya / ākāśa pitu / maṅkana vuvus bhaṭara / riṅ saṅ kumāra //
text.176: kṛtayugaṃ jāgrat proktaṃ tretāṃ svapnapadaṃ viduḥ /
text.177: dvāparaṃ ca suṣuptaṃ nu kalis tūryyam ity ucyate // 40
text.178: ikaṅ jāgrapada ya kṛta ṅaranya / ikaṅ svapnapada ya tretā ṅaranya / ikaṅ suṣuptapada ya dvāpara ṅaranya / ikaṅ tūryyapada ya kalisaṅhāra ṅaranya /
text.179: nābhimūle bhavej jāgrat svapna hṛdaya ucyate /
text.180: hṛdayānte suṣuptaṃ ca kaṇṭhe tūryyam ihocyate // 41
text.181: ri vit niṅ pusar ya sinaṅguh jāgrapada / riṅ hati ya sinaṅguh svapnapada / ry agra niṅ hṛdaya ya sinaṅguh suṣuptapada / ri suṅsuṅ niṅ iruṅ guruṅan / ya tūryyapada ṅaranya / maṅkana liṅ bhaṭara //
text.182: lalāṭe caiva tūryyāntaṃ kaivalyaṃ ca pāṇau sthitam /
text.184: iṅ rahi muṅguh tūryyanta / riṅ pāṇi muṅguh kaivalya / riṅ hulu muṅguh paramakaivalya / nahan ika saptasūkṣmapiṇḍa ṅaranya pih //
text.185: pūrvvāhhne jāgrad ityuktaṃ madhyāhne svapna eva ca /
text.186: aparāhhne suṣuptaṃ ca rātryāṃ tūryyam ihocyate // 43
text.187: ikaṅ jāgrapada ya sakatambe / ikaṅ svapnapada / ya tṅah ṅve / ikaṅ suṣuptapada / ya sore / ikaṅ tūryyapada / ya vṅi //
text.188: śuklavarṇṇaṃ bhavej jāgrat svapnaś ca ravisannibhaḥ /
text.190: putih varṇṇa niṅ jāgrapada / kadi varṇṇa niṅ āditya / ikaṅ svapnapada / ikaṅ suṣuptapada / kadi vulan varṇṇanya / kadi sphaṭika varṇṇa nikaṅ tūryyapada //
text.192: ātmavat paraṃ kaivalyaṃ paraṃ kaivalyaṃ śāntidam // 45
text.193: varṇṇa niṅ tūryyānta / kadi pirak / varṇṇa niṅ kaivalya / kadi hmās / varṇṇa niṅ paramakaivalya / ana prabhāsvara juga / saṅkṣepanya / ikaṅ paramakaivalya / katmu kalpasan //
text.194: padaṃ jāgrat tu  bramaṇaḥ svapno viṣṇupadaṃ tathā /
text.196: hyaṅ nikaṅ jāgrapada / saṅ hyaṅ brahmā / hyaṅ nikaṅ svapnapada / saṅ hyaṅ viṣṇu / hyaṅ nikaṅ suṣuptapada / saṅ hyaṅ rudra / hyaṅ nikaṅ tūryyapada saṅ hyaṅ maheśvara //
text.198: paramātmanaś ca kaivalyaṃ paraṃ kaivalyaṃ śāntidam // 47
text.199: hyaṅ nikaṅ tūryyanta / saṅ hyaṅ mahādeva / sira sinaṅguh śivapada ṅaranya / hyaṅ nikaṅ kaivalya / saṅ hyaṅ īśāna / hyaṅ nikaṅ paramakaivalya / bhaṭara paramaśiva / sira ta śāntida ṅaranya / sinaṅguh kamokṣan / maṅkana liṅ bhaṭara / umarahmarah ri saṅ kumāra //
text.2: Tattwajnana and Mahajnana (two Kawi philosophical texts).
text.201: puṇḍarīkaḥ suṣuptaṃ ca rājasūyaś ca tūryyakam // 48
text.202: ikaṅ jāgrapada / ya aśvamedhayajña / ikaṅ svapnapada / ya vājapeyayajña / ikaṅ suṣuptapada / ya puṇḍarīka / ikaṅ tūryyapada / ya rājasūya ṅaranya //
text.205: ikaṅ jāgrapada / ya pakuvvan vatĕk hyaṅ brahmā / ibĕkan pva caturmmukha divyarūpa sira / paḍa putih deniṅ avu / paḍa maṅunyākĕn caturvvedamantra / mvaṅ jaṭādhara / paḍa brahmacārī sira / paḍa masavit brahmasūtra / maṅkana pahyasnira / nitya samūjā riṅ saṅ hyaṅ brahmā sira //
text.208: ikaṅ svapnapada / ya pakuvvan vatĕk hyaṅ viṣṇu / kapva divyarūpa / paḍa sira caturbhuja / kapva sira maṅgĕgö śaṅkha sakra mvaṅ gadā / paḍa manuṅgali garuḍa //
text.211: ikaṅ suṣuptapada / ya pakuvvan śiṣya bhaṭara rudra / sira paḍa maṅgĕgö kāla / kapva sira trilocana / paḍa mamava triśūla / paḍa manuṅgaṅi ḷmbu //
text.214: ikaṅ tūryyapada / ya pakuvvan śiṣya bhaṭareśvara / kapva sira tṛpti sadākāla / tanpa lvir sira / tātan hana kahyunira / vāyu pinakasvabhāva nira hana riṅ sarvvabhūta //
text.216: yo jñātvaitām ātmānañ caiva bhavantacārīti smṛtaḥ // 53
text.217: ikaṅ tūryyāntapada / ya pakupvan kahanan bhaṭara śiva / sira ta kavruhana de saṅ viku / sira maṅĕnaṅĕna jñāna de bhaṭara / lavan saṅ hyaṅ ātmā / parananya msat / ri kāla niṅ pralaya / tātan hanaṅ janma liṅ bhaṭara / tan dadya kapunarbhāva //
text.220: saṅ hyaṅ mahādeva sira tikta ṅaranira / saṅ hyaṅ maheśvara sira jīva / kady aṅgan iṅ māyā katon iṅ cṛmin / maṅkana bhaṭāra / an pinakajīva niṅ rāt kabeh / anan katon iṅ śarīra / ika ta kabeh / ya upadeśa ṅaranya / liṅ bhaṭara ri saṅ kumāra //
text.223: saṅ hyaṅ hinajarakĕn bhaṭara / i tṅah niṅ tikta / kady aṅgan iṅ māyā katon iṅ cṛmin / maṅkana ta sira katon iṅ citta / saṅ hyaṅ īśvara sira tikta / nihan //
text.224: kamalaṃ ca praṇālaṃ ca tiktam īśvara eva va /
text.226: ikaṅ paruparu / ya kamala / yeka ṅaran  praṇāla / ikaṅ tikta / ya ta ṅaran liṅga / ikaṅ śarīra / ya ta ṅaran kahyaṅan / putus niṅ sinaṅguh divya bhaṭara / maheśvara / sira pratiṣṭhe ṅkāna // ikaṅ śarīra pradhāna / maṅkana lavaṅ saṅa //
text.229: kunaṅ ikaṅ tikta / sāsāṅguṣṭhapramāṇanya / prabhāva bhaṭareśvara / kadi sphaṭika / ikaṅ śarīra tulya kahyaṅan / maṅkana ta bhaṭareśvara / maṅĕnaṅĕntānaku saṅ kumāra //
text.232: ndya nikaṅ mahāpuṅguṅ / mavāda jātinya / aṅ inujarakĕn tikta / ade ika sāṅguṣṭha göṅnya / ikaṅ tikta / an paḍa göṅnya lavan nusa pitu / apa nikaṅ saptadvīpa ṅaranya / maṅkana ta bhaṭareśvara / sira ta mahāprabhāva juga tarvvānya mapaga / nahan ta liṅ nikaṅ mamuṅguṅ / ya sinaṅguh saṅ paṇḍita madvan //
text.233: vāme bāhau sthito viṣṇur ddakṣiṇe ca caturmmukhaḥ /
text.235: saṅ hyaṅ viṣṇu sira muṅgv iṅ bāhu keri / saṅ hyaṅ brahmā sira muṅgv iṅ bāhu tṅan / bhaṭara maheśvara sira muṅgv iṅ patṅahtṅahan saṅ hyaṅ brahmā viṣṇu / saṅ hyaṅ tigāvak bhaṭara / saṅkṣepanya n katiga / saṅ hyaṅ brahmā viṣṇu maheśvara / avak bhaṭara sira //
text.236: hṛdaye sūkṣmabhūtaṃ ca jñāne tiṣṭhati nityaśaḥ /
text.237: sūkṣmatvaṃ ca vibhutvaṃ ca ? kathaṃ jñeyaḥ si to stha ti ? // 60
text.238: ri samaṅkana niṅ sūkṣma ṅ hati / tathāpinya maṅkana kinavruhanta ya deniṅ jñāna / amĕṅanya vkasan / umuṅguh riṅ jñāna lanā / sayojya lavan bhaṭara / hana ta śūnya sakeṅ śūnya / hana ta malit sakeṅ malit / paramakaivalya / nirāśraya ṅaranya / tan kinahanan deniṅ sukhaduhkha / maṅkana liṅ bhaṭara //
text.239: hṛdaye padmakoṣaś ca mokṣadaṃ tripadaṃ jñeyam /
text.240: ? sarvvaśva yathā nimahāt sthānaṃ sasya pratiṣṭhati // 61
text.241: hana ta padma riṅ hati / hana ta padma riṅ paruparu / ya ta padmakośa ṅaranya / hana ta hṛdaya ṅaranya / sumuṅsaṅ ya malyaṅ pih / ika ta kabeh ya tripada ṅaranya / uṅgvan iṅ rāt kabeh //
text.243: hṛdayānte padaṃ śūnyaṃ paraṃ kaivalyam ucyate // 62
text.244: ikaṅ hati malilaṅ malit / ya paḍa lavan āditya sevu / tejanyālilaṅ paripūrṇṇa riṅ hayu / tumpuk niṅ hati yeka pada śūnya / ya sinaṅguh paramakaivalya //
text.246: yaj jñātvā śarīre 'smin mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ // 63
text.247: ikaṅ hati / hana śivapada ṅaranya / ikaṅ oṃkāra ya paramaśūnya / sūkṣma pih / ikaṅ vvaṅ kumavruh ikaṅ śivapada saṅkeṅ śarīra / ya teka tan kasandehākna / liṅ bhaṭara //
text.250: lvir niṅ saṅ puruṣa / sḍĕṅ nira n haneṅ tṅah niṅ āpah / kadi ula sira n katatakut / saṅ hyaṅ oṃkāra ta sira haran garuḍa / sira tāmava saṅ puruṣa / riṅ śivapada //
text.253: nihan deya saṅ mahyun lpasa / ikaṅ śarīra ya tunu vehĕn gsĕṅa / de nira saṅ hyaṅ oṃkāra / sira ta maṅaran apuy //
text.254: sarvveṣām akṣarāṇāṃ ca oṅkāraś ca viśiṣyate /
text.256: kadivyan  saṅ hyaṅ oṃkāra / sira ḷvih saṅkeṅ mantra kabeh / sira sinaṅguh paramasūkṣma / maṅkana ikaṅ kamokṣan kapaṅguh de nira / saṅ hyaṅ oṃkāra pinakamārgga de saṅ yogīśvara //
text.257: nirakṣaraṃ bhaven nityaṃ nissatvaṃ caiva niṣkalam /
text.259: tan kna riṅ akṣara / tan hana / ṅuniveh sarvvabhāva kabeh / ikaṅ maṅkana ya ta sūkṣma / liṅ bhaṭara //
text.260: ātmā caivāntarātmā ca paramātmā tathaiva ca /
text.261: atyantaś ca vibhūḥ śūnyaḥ [?] antyo bhūḥ paramaḥ śivaḥ // 68
text.262: hana ta ātmā ṅaranya / hana ta antarātmā ṅaranya / hana ta paramātma ṅaranya / i tṅah nikaṅ tiga / hana ta atyantātmā ṅaranya / śūnya sira prabhu / sinaṅguh paramaśiva / nihśreyasa / kayatnākna tmĕntmĕn //
text.263: ātmā viṣṇur iti jñeyaḥ antarātmā pitāmahaḥ /
text.264: paramātmā tathā rudraḥ atyantaḥ paramaḥ śivaḥ // 69
text.265: saṅ hyaṅ viṣṇu sira ātmā / saṅ hyaṅ brahmā sira antarātmā / bhaṭara rudra sira paramātmā/ bhaṭara śiva sira atyantātmā //
text.266: akāro jāgrad ityuktam ukāraḥ svapna eva ca /
text.267: makāraś ca suṣuptaṃ bho oṅkāras tūryyam eva ca // 70
text.268: ikaṅ akāra / ya jāgrabīja / ikaṅ ukāra / ya svapnabīja / ikaṅ makāra / ya suṣuptabīja / ikaṅ oṃkāra / ya tūryyabīja //
text.270: nābhau hṛdaye kaṇṭhe ca mastake cavido viduḥ // 71
text.271: hana ta sthāna pāt kvehnya / oṃkāra lavan bhaṭara / ndya ta deśa niṅ pāt / lvirnya / pusĕr / iṅ hati / iṅ gulu / iṅ hulu //
text.272: manaḥ kaivalyaṃ vijñeyaṃ buddhir brahmā prakīrtitaḥ /
text.273: ahaṅkāras tathā rudraḥ sattvaṃ caiva maheśvaraḥ // 72
text.274: bhaṭara viṣṇu sira hyaṅ niṅ manah / bhaṭara brahmā sira hyaṅ niṅ buddhi / bhaṭara rudra sira hyaṅ niṅ ahaṅkāra / bhaṭara maheśvara sira hyaṅ niṅ sattva //
text.277: sira bhaṭara mevĕh kapaṅgihanira / tan kinavruhan deniṅ mapuṅguṅ / dumeh ya maṅkana / saka ri kveh niṅ jñāna / ika ta vvaṅ vruh riṅ bhaṭara / mvaṅ henak donira vruh ri tattva bhaṭara / ya teka tan kasandehākna ya kalpasan //
text.278: saṃsārasāgare ghore oṅkāro hi nauś cocyate /
text.280: makveh saṅ hyaṅ inajarakĕn / hana oṃkāra ṅaranira / sira parahu sabhāvanta / ikaṅ sāgarakaharan tasikta / saṅ hyaṅ oṃkāra pva sira parahvanta / yatanyan hĕntasan ikaṅ pāpa magöṅ / hlas pva kita ḍataṅ ri pāda bhaṭara / lavan sayogya kita / hĕntyakĕnta parahunta / apan tan ana prayojananta / an huvus lpas / prayojananta / samaṅkana juga paknanya //
text.282: hṛdaye lakṣayet tathā mokṣa eva prakīrtitaḥ // 75
text.283: nihan yoganta ri huripta / hana pada sūkṣma nirguṇa / tan kahanan rajah tamah / irika jñāna pinakasvabhāvanya / ri haneṅ śarīra / ya ta katon denta riṅ hati / apan yeka mūrtti bhaṭara sira / ya sinaṅguh kamokṣan liṅ bhaṭara //
text.284: kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca lobhaṃ ca mohaṃ mātsaryyam eva ca /
text.285: oṅkārāgnau tāni dagdhvā niḥśoka iva candramāḥ // 76
text.286: ndyārthanya / kāma / kahyun / krodha / glĕṅ / moha / lobha / puṅguṅ / mātsaryya / kimburu / mahyun tumuṅgalakna suta / ika ta kabeh / pūjākna ri saṅ hyaṅ brahmā / ika saṅ hyaṅ oṃkāra / sira haran apuy / uvus pva gsĕṅ ika kabeh / suvanihśreyasa kita / tan tan katampĕlan mala //
text.288: yathā sūḍhaṃ tathā labdhaṃ mucyate sarvvaduḥkhebhyaḥ // 77
text.289: kunaṅ ri saṅ sumaṅguhakĕn saṅ hyaṅ upadeśa / eka kitānaku saṅ kumāra / putraputraṅku kita / vacana tikaṅ vubusku ri kita / śṛṇu ya kaṛṅökĕnta / kadi lvir nikaṅ jñāna pih / sasar lvir nikaṅ phala paṅguhĕnta / maṅkana ikaṅ khaṇḍaṅ āścaryya / samaṅkana lvirnira luput sakeṅ pāpa //
text.290: ataḥ prayojanān nityaṃ guruṃ śuśrūṣeta sadā /
text.291: yathā śāsti tathā kuryyāt sa vaktā hy upadeśānām // 78
text.292: kadi pvan ika saṅ hyaṅ kṛtopadeśa / tarppa niṣphala / maṅkana liṅ saṅ guru / an misanakĕn lavan bhaṭara guru / nityaśah sira makāgulugul bhaṭara //
text.293: gātraṃ vā sarvvaśāstrāṇāṃ dhṛtam oṃkāram eva ca /
text.294: tatra sāre dhṛtaṃ guhyaṃ yaj jñātvā śāntim āpnuyāt // 79
text.295: ika ta vi de saṅ guru / salaṅ saṅ hyaṅ śāstratah / deya nira yan paveh kalpasan / hayu si madvārākĕn / maṅkana de nira n maveh upadeśa / hayva sira maṅicchā pih / apan saṅ hyaṅ śāstra paṅalapan sira / paḍa sira lavan śākti / paṅalapan madhupāthar / saṅ hyaṅ oṃkāra pva sira mulih ṅamut putus niṅ divya / gañĕn iḍĕpĕn / aṅĕnaṅĕnĕn / paramārtthanya / hana pva sira saṅ vruh pinakasvāmī niṅ rāt / mvaṅ saṅ vruh ri saṅ pinakanimitta niṅ aji / sira ta humaṅguh saṅ hyaṅ kalpasan //
text.296: vyaktaṃ ca prakṛtiṃ vidyād avyaktaṃ puruṣaṃ viduḥ /
text.297: tayor asad vyaktaṃ sac ca puruṣam avyaktaṃ viduḥ // 80
text.298: ikaṅ prakṛti / ya sinaṅguh vyākta ṅaranya / vyākta ṅaranya / tan hana tṅah nikaṅ rva / hana ta sira saṅ puruṣa ṅaranira / jāti nira nirvvikāra prakṛti ṅaranira / sira ta yukti kavruhana kamu ṅ kumāra //
text.3: Delhi : International Academy of Indian Culture, 1962.
text.301: kunaṅ ikaṅ tūryyapada / ya dumeh ya molah / ikaṅ jāgra svapna suṣupta / ya maganti molah / iulahakĕn pva ya deniṅ tūryya / ya matanyan vvaṅ makolah gavenya / yatanyan kapaṅguha svavṛttinya / kady aṅgan iṅ teja ṅ katut svavṛtti niṅ vulan //
text.302: rudraloke tathā mātā īśvaro vā tathā pitā /
text.303: gurur vvāpi mahādeva iti devavido viduḥ // 82
text.304: saṅ hyaṅ ṛṣi ibunta / saṅ hyaṅ īśvara bapanta / saṅ hyaṅ mahādeva sira guru kakinta / nahan lvir niṅ devatā pinakajātinya / pinakavitanta / liṅ saṅ vruh rasa niṅ tattva //
text.305: rātriś ca prakṛtir jñeyā raviś ca puruṣas tathā /
text.306: dyutiś ca vā mahādevaḥ śūnyaṃ ca paramaḥ śivaḥ // 83
text.307: ikaṅ prakṛti ya sinaṅguh vṅi / saṅ puruṣa sira sinaṅguh āditya / saṅ hyaṅ mahādeva sira pinakateja / bhaṭara śiva sira śūnya / sira ta yukti kavruhana /
text.310: ikaṅ jñāna mahājñāna ṅaranya / putus niṅ guhya / nitya hananya riṅ sarvvabhāva kabeh / ikaṅ vyakta / avyakta / ya teka haryyakna / ya ta upadeśa ṅaranya //
text.313: anuṅ umaṅĕnaṅĕn ikaṅ jñāna kabeh / kahananya bhaṭara śiva juga / sira ta kahananira pih / ika ta don bhaṭara / matanyan gaveyakĕn tekaṅ karmma / mvaṅ amintonakĕn kuśala / ri hyun iran humanugrahāna ika iri kita //
text.316: i ṅke saṅ hyaṅ mahājñāna / mahātattva / sira viśeṣa niṅ tattva / samāpta tuḷs tka riṅ dinonya / hayva ta saṅśaya kitānaku saṅ kumāra //ātmaliṅge śivah sthitah // bhaṭara śiva sira umuṅguh riṅ ātmaliṅga //śūnyaśūnyāntare tathā // ya sinaṅguh vkas niṅ śūnya ṅaranya //
text.317: jñānaṃ saṃkṣepato hy atra jñānasandhiś ca procyate /
text.318: jñānam etan mahāguhyaṃ yatnād gṛhhṇīta putrakāḥ // 87
text.319: ike saṅ hyaṅ jñāna / ya guhya / pājarku ri kitānaku saṅ kumāra / ya teka kayatnāknantānaku / yan mahyun iṅ padaviśeṣa / nahan ta ya jñāna saṅkṣipta / jñānasandhi ṅaranya vaneh / ya ta kavruhaknanta / tan dadi kapunarbhāva / maṅkana liṅ bhaṭara / mavaravarah ri saṅ kumāra / riṅ upadeśa lavan tattva ni saṅ vatĕk ṛṣi / saṅkṣipta kalpasan / mantuk bhatara / mvaṅ bhaṭarī //0//
text.320: iti tattva saṅ hyaṅ mahājñāna / mulih ṅ antaviśeṣa //0//
text.46: Unless indicated otherwise, accents have been dropped in order
text.48: For a comprehensive list of GRETIL encodings and formats see:
text.54: ri sḍĕṅ saṅ kumāra maṅaji ri bhaṭara guru / tumaṅākĕn saṅ hyaṅ mahājñāna / manĕmbah ta sira ri bhaṭara / liṅ nira / oṃ namah śiwāya / ri tlas nira manĕmbah / ujar ta sira / liṅ nira //
text.56: kāyena manasā śubhaṃ tasmai mayā samudāhṛtam // 1
text.57: sājñā bhaṭara / kṣantavyakna hikiṅ panĕmbah rānak bhaṭara / mvaṅ katattvan saṅ hyaṅ lyabiṅ rāt kabeh / pnuh riṅ jagat / mvaṅ syāvak niṅ ātmā nātha / kahanan bhaṭara / apan maṅkana pva kadivvyan bhaṭara / ya ta mataṅnyan panĕmbah ṅhulun hyaṅ mami / kāraṇa niṅ hulun sumĕmbah ri pādukā hyaṅ mami / ikeṅ awak niṅ hulun / henakāgran bhakti riṅ bhaṭara / mvaṅ vuvus niṅ hulun rahayu / lavan enak ambĕk rahayv anak hyaṅ mami //
text.58: kiṃ nu suptaṃ śarīre 'smin kiṃ nu jāgarti jāgrate /
text.59: kiṃ nu gataṃ daśadiśi kiṃ nu jarati jīryyati // 2
text.60: sājñā hyaṅ mami / aparan teki maturu ṅkeṅ śarīra / aparan teki mataṅhi wih / mvaṅ aparan teki mahas ṅkeṅ śarīra / lavan paran teki masyuh ṅkeṅ avak / maṅkana takvan saṅ kumāra riṅ bhaṭara / deva uvāca / sumahur bhaṭara / liṅ nira //
text.63: he kamuṅ kumāra / anuṅ sinaṅguh maturu / ikaṅ daśendriya / ikaṅ mataṅhi / vāyu lavan teja / ya sinaṅguh pañcāvāyu ṅaranya // lvirnya / prāṇa / apāna / samāna / udāna / vyāna / ika sinaṅguh teja prabhāva / sūb niṅ śarīra / ya tekāmaṅĕnaha riṅ avak / ikaṅ mahas riṅ daśadeśa / manah bhrāntāvaknya / pinakasahāya niṅ maṅhipi / ikaṅ masyuh / lmah lavan vvayika / kady aṅgan iṅ hariṅĕt pravṛttinya //
text.64: ekā bhāryyā trayaḥ putrā dve hale daśa dhenavaḥ /
text.65: sukṣmetre mama vasatir yyo vetti sa raviṃ vrajet // 4
text.66: hana yānakbi tuṅgal / anak ta ya tlu / hana ta gala rvaṅ siki / lavan ḷmbu sapuluh / uṅgvanya tṅah niṅ savah / an pva muvah riṅ tānakbi tuṅgal mānak tlu / mvaṅ hikaṅ gala rvaṅ lavan ikaṅ ḷmbu sapuluh / mvah hika savah kahananya / ya teka tka ri pada bhaṭara śiva / saṅ vruh irika / ya tumĕmvakĕni saṅ pinakasvāmī niṅ rāt kabeh //
text.67: bhāryyā vyaktaṃ guṇāḥ putrā mano buddhiś ca dve hale /
text.69: ikaṅ pradhāna / ya sinaṅguh anakbi tuṅgal / ikaṅ triguṇa / ya sinaṅguh anak tlu / apan mijil sakeṅ pradhāna ya / ikaṅ buddhi manah / ya sinaṅguh gala rvaṅ siki / sinaṅguh ḷmbu sapuluh / ikaṅ daśendriya / ya sinaṅguh savah / ikaṅ vit niṅ ati / mvaṅ pusuhpusuh / ika ta kabeh kavruhan de saṅ mahyun kalpasan //
text.7: - Old Javanese ḥ has been converted to h and
text.70: mātaraṃ pitaraṃ hatvā dvau harau dvau ca brāhmaṇau /
text.71: sa rāṣṭraṃ nagaraṃ hatvā rudralokam avāpnuyāt // 6
text.72: bapanta mvaṅ hibunta / sira patyananta / mvaṅ maliṅ rva / mvaṅ brāhmaṇa rva / ptyananta teka / tlas pjah pva bapanta mvaṅ hibunta / mvaṅ hikaṅ maliṅ rva / lavan ikaṅ brāhmaṇa rva / mvaṅ kaḍatvan lavan varṇṇa mami / kapaṅguh taṅ rudraloka denta / maṅkana liṅ bhaṭara //
text.73: mātaraṃ prakṛtiṃ vidyāt puruṣaṃ ca pitaraṃ viduḥ /
text.74: dharmmo 'dharmmaś ca dvau harau buddhir mmanaś ca brāhmaṇau // 7
text.75: saṅ prakṛti sira sinaṅguh ibu / saṅ puruṣa sira sinaṅguh bapa / dharmmādharmma ika sinaṅguh maliṅ rva / ikaṅ buddhi manah sinaṅguh brāhmaṇa rva //
text.76: daśendriyāṇi rāṣṭraṃ hi śarīraṃ nagaraṃ tathā /
text.77: ātmanā tu hatvā sarvva rudralokam avāpnuyāt // 8
text.78: ya sinaṅguh kaḍatvan / ikaṅ daśendriya / ya sinaṅguh vanva / ikaṅ śarīra / ika ta kabeh patyanakna / patyanakna ṅaranya / tiṅgalakna kaliṅan ika / sāmpun pva kavaśa kabeh katiṅgal / māti kaliṅanya / kapaṅguh taṅ rudraloka denta //
text.79: ākāśe jāyate puṣpaṃ nadyāṃ jvalati pāvakaḥ /
text.8: - Small Letter Eng ("ng"-digraph; Unicode: ŋ) has been converted to ṅ
text.80: mṛdupṛṣṭhāni kūrmmāṇāṃ rātrau ca jāyate raviḥ // 9
text.81: hana kambaṅ iṅ ākāśa / havann apuy dumilah ri daḷm vvay / hana ya pasmapĕs gigirnya / hana tāditya mtu riṅ vṅi / ika ta kavruhana de saṅ mahyun kalpasan //
text.82: ka ākāśaś ca kiṃ puṣpaṃ kā nadī ko hi pāvakaḥ /
text.83: kūrmmapṛṣṭhāni kānyeva kā rātriḥ ko ravis tathā // 10
text.84: aparan teka sinaṅguh bhaṭara ākāśa / aparan teka sinaṅguh kambaṅ vih / aparan teka sinaṅguh lvah / aparan sinaṅguh apuy ri daḷm vvay / aparan ta sinaṅguh pasmapĕs gigirnya / aparan ta sinaṅguh vṅi ṅaranya vih / aparan sinaṅguh āditya riṅ vṅi //
text.85: svaṃ śarīraṃ manaḥ puṣpaṃ oṃkāraḥ pāvakaḥ smṛtaḥ /
text.86: daśendriyāṇi kūrmmāś ca sarvvā nāḍyo nadyaḥ smṛtāḥ // 11
text.87: ikaṅ śarīra / ya ākāśa ṅaranya / saṅ hyaṅ manah sira kambaṅ / saṅ hyaṅ oṃkāra sira apuy / ri daḷm vvay / ikaṅ daśendriya / yeka pasmapĕs gigirnya / ikaṅ lvah ṅaranya / nāḍi otvat ika //
text.88: rātriś ca prakṛtir jñeyā raviś ca puruṣas tathā /
text.89: ātmajñānaṃ tu vijñāya mucyate nātra saṃśayaḥ // 12
text.9: This electronic text has NOT BEEN PROOFREAD.
text.90: saṅ pradhāna sira vṅi / saṅ puruṣa sirāditya mtu riṅ vṅi / saṅ hyaṅ ātmā sira sinaṅguh jñāna / vruh pva vvaṅ irika kabeh / tan sandehākna mulih mariṅ pada bhaṭara //
text.91: skandho rātriś ca vijñeyaś cakṣuś ca vā ravis tathā /
text.92: manojñānaṃ tu vijñāya sa mucyate vai janmanaḥ // 13
text.93: sinaṅguh vṅi ṅaranya vaneh / ikaṅ śarīra pañcamahābhūta / ravi ṅaranya / ikaṅ daśendriya / sinaṅguh jñānātmā / sira ta luput iṅ janmasaṅsāra //
text.94: mano buddhir ahaṅkāro vāyubhiḥ pañcabhiḥ saha /
text.96: hana ta manah / buddhi / ahaṅkāra / hana ta pañcāvāyu ṅaranya vaneh / lvirnya / prāṇa / apāna / samāna / udāna / vyāna / lima bhedanya //prāṇāṣṭau sarvvabhūtānām // ika ta kabeh vvalu piṇḍanya / pinakaprāṇa niṅ bhūta kabeh /śarīraṃ sūkṣmam ucyate // ya sinaṅguh sūkṣmaśarīra ṅaranya vaneh //
text.97: ratha indriyāṇīty uktaḥ puruṣaś caiva sārathiḥ /
text.99: ratha ṅaranya / ikaṅ daśendriya / puruṣa sira sārathi / ikaṅ dharmmādharmma / pinakatatali / saṅ pradhāna sira pinakāvak //
